channel.title: Looking for Developers! [PI]
channel.description:
[center][b]Introduction:[/b] I'm BossRoss and i'm looking forward to starting an Economy server called "Economize". I have alot of free time to make this server...
[b]What is already done:[/b] GWDS PKP System Pest Switching FullScreen Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect. World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost) Barbarian assault Redone Dungeoneering with no smuggling, even if someone manages to smuggle there are around 10 checks, example if a player logsin with dung items outside of dung they will be banned automaticly. Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect. (i dont take credit.^)
[b]What i want done:[/b] I want the server to be an Economy server. I'd like Dicing, Flower Game, Etc all 100% Working. Home at a unique place. (Top Of Pyramid for Desert Treasure).
[b]Commands:[/b] ::Teleto(Rights 1+). ::Teletome (Rights 1+). ::Info (Shows whoevers bank+inventory.) (Rights 1+). ::Kick (Rights 1+). ::Giveitem (Rights 2+). ::Takeitem (Rights 2+). ::Pickup (Rights 2+). ::Item (Rights 2+). ::Pest ::Barrows ::gwds ::dbeast
[b]Custom Items: (I got the packs for them).[/b] Beautiful Cape. Danger Cape. Demon Set. Monkey Bag. Admin GodSword. Cigarette.
MY [u]MSN[/u] - Br0k22@yahoo.com[/center]

item.title: Looking for Developers! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @enjoiiii enjoiiii
item.description:
@enjoiiii wrote:

[center]Introduction:
I’m BossRoss and i’m looking forward to starting an Economy server called “Economize”.
I have alot of free time to make this server…

What is already done:
GWDS
PKP System
Pest
Switching
FullScreen
Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect.
World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost)
Barbarian assault
Redone Dungeoneering with no smuggling, even if someone manages to smuggle there are around 10 checks, example if a player logsin with dung items outside of dung they will be banned automaticly.
Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect.
(i dont take credit.^)

What i want done:
I want the server to be an Economy server.
I’d like Dicing, Flower Game, Etc all 100% Working.
Home at a unique place. (Top Of Pyramid for Desert Treasure).

Commands:
::Teleto(Rights 1+).
::Teletome (Rights 1+).
::Info (Shows whoevers bank+inventory.) (Rights 1+).
::Kick (Rights 1+).
::Giveitem (Rights 2+).
::Takeitem (Rights 2+).
::Pickup (Rights 2+).
::Item (Rights 2+).
::Pest
::Barrows
::gwds
::dbeast

Custom Items: (I got the packs for them).
Beautiful Cape.
Danger Cape.
Demon Set.
Monkey Bag.
Admin GodSword.
Cigarette.

MY MSN - Br0k22@yahoo.com[/center]
